targets.expr: sum by(host) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri" | __error__ = "" [$__interval]))

sum by (status) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri" | __error__ = "" [$__interval]))
bytes_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} [$__interval])

sum by (host) (sum_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri" | unwrap bytes_sent |  __error__="" [$__interval]))

sum(count_over_time(({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} |= "Googlebot")[$__interval])) / (sum(count_over_time(({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} != "Googlebot")[$__interval])) / 100)

count(sum by (remote_addr, remote_port) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri" | __error__ = "" [$__interval])))
count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} [$__interval])

sum(count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri" | status >= 500 | __error__="" [$__interval])) / (sum(count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri" | __error__ = "" [$__interval])) / 100)

sum(count_over_time(({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} |= "bingbot")[$__interval])) / (sum(count_over_time(({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} != "bingbot")[$__interval])) / 100)

{$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri" | __error__ = "" | line_format "➡️ {{.request_method}} {{.request_uri}} [status={{.status}}, http_host={{.http_host}}, remote_addr={{.remote_addr}}, request_time={{.request_time}}] "

sum by(host) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri" | __error__ = "" [$__interval]))

count(sum by (remote_addr, remote_port) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri" | __error__ = "" [$__interval])))

quantile_over_time(0.50,{$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri" | unwrap request_time |  __error__ = ""  [$__interval]) by (host)

quantile_over_time(0.90,{$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri" | unwrap request_time |  __error__ = ""  [$__interval]) by (host)

quantile_over_time(0.95,{$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri" | unwrap request_time |  __error__ = ""  [$__interval]) by (host)

quantile_over_time(0.99,{$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri" | unwrap request_time |  __error__ = ""  [$__interval]) by (host)

max by (host) (max_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri" | unwrap request_time |  __error__ = ""  [$__interval]))

sum by (status) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri" | __error__ = "" [$__interval]))

sum by (host) (sum_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri" | status=200 | unwrap bytes_sent |  __error__ = "" [$__interval]))

topk(100, sum by (request_uri) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} !~ `\.ico|\.svg|\.css|\.png|\.txt|\.js|\.xml` | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri"  | status = 200 and request_uri != "/" | __error__ = "" [$__interval])))

panels.title: Top 100 Requested Pages By Request Uri

targets.expr: topk(100, sum by (uri) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} !~ `\.ico|\.svg|\.css|\.png|\.txt|\.js|\.xml` | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri"  | status = 200 and request_uri != "/" | __error__ = "" [$__interval])))

topk(100, max by (request_uri) (max_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} !~ `\.ico|\.svg|\.css|\.png|\.txt|\.js|\.xml` | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri"  | status = 200 and request_uri != "/" | __error__ = "" | unwrap request_time [$__interval])))

panels.title: Top 100 Request Time By Request Uri

targets.expr: topk(100, max by (uri) (max_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} !~ `\.ico|\.svg|\.css|\.png|\.txt|\.js|\.xml` | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri"  | status = 200 and request_uri != "/" | __error__ = "" | unwrap request_time [$__interval])))

topk(100, max by (request_uri) (max_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} !~ `\.ico|\.svg|\.css|\.png|\.txt|\.js|\.xml` | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri"  | status = 200 and request_uri != "/" | __error__ = "" | unwrap bytes_sent  [$__interval])))

panels.title: Top 100 Bytes Sent By Request Uri

targets.expr: topk(100, max by (uri) (max_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} !~ `\.ico|\.svg|\.css|\.png|\.txt|\.js|\.xml` | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri"  | status = 200 and request_uri != "/" | __error__ = "" | unwrap bytes_sent [$__interval])))

topk(100, sum by (server_name) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri" | server_name != "" | __error__ = "" [$__interval])))

topk(100, sum by (http_x_forwarded_for) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri" | http_x_forwarded_for != "" | __error__ = "" [$__interval])))

topk(100, sum by (http_referer) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri" |  http_referer != "" and http_referer !~ ".*?$host.*?" and http_referer !~ ".*?\\*\\*\\*.*?" | __error__ = "" [$__interval])))

topk(100, sum by (http_user_agent) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri" |  __error__ = "" [$__interval])))

topk(100, sum by (remote_addr, geoip2_country_code, geoip2_city_name) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri" | __error__ = "" [$__interval])))

topk(100, sum by (geoip2_country_code) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri" | geoip2_country_code != "" |  __error__ = "" [$__interval])))

topk(100, sum by (geoip2_country_code, geoip2_city_name) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri" | geoip2_city_name != "" | __error__ = "" [$__interval])))

sum by (geoip2_country_code) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | server_name =~ "$server_name" | uri =~ "$uri" | request_url =~ "$request_uri" | geoip2_country_code != "" | __error__ = "" [$__interval]))
